PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Animated Guardian (yes he is important, no he doesnt die, just get a lvl 20 gem dont summmon him at lvl 12)
Dying Breath Asenath's Gentle Touch WindScream Leercast
CHEST OPTIONS
Garb of Ephemral - This option makes YOU more tanky. Doppelganger Guise - This Option makes your AG super tanky.
OPTIONAL - If you find yourself running low on ES in the end game setup, you can change anoints to Charisma, and replace vitality with Disipline. This gives you a bigger max hit, but less life regen and 1 less spectre. Personal Preferance here. .
_____________LEVELING GEAR_________
Mark of the Red Covenant helmet will carry you to maps. Sidhbreath Amulet will carry flat damage from lvl 4 to Part 2.
Swap to poison as soon as you get Unnatural stregth, even with just Chance to poison support this is a damage up.
^xB97123Min Max End Game (OverKill)^7
^xE05030End Game Min Max (Overkill)^7
https://pobb.in/Nl7cF1f5Gw3T

Skill.label: --Temp Chains in POB because AG applies it--
--Temp Chains in POB because AG applies it--
^6Main DMG (melee phys if 4L later in act 2)
^6MAIN DMG (use till level 8 and correct links)

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
^4=== Animate Guardian Modifiers === Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit Nearby Enemies have 18% increased Effect of Curses on them Nearby allies gain 18% increased Damage You and nearby allies gain 50% increased Damage You can apply an additional Curse 25% Chance to Inflict withered For 2 seconds on hit
#MIN/MAX AG MODS (remove the # from this #list and put it infront of the top list to change)
#You can apply an additional Curse #You and Nearby Allies have 47 to 61 added Chaos Damage #Nearby Enemies have -10% Chaos Resistance #Fortify
